Verses: 1 pinnum Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Aisuvariyavaanaagiya Oru Manushanukku Oru Ukkiraanakkaaran Irundhaan; Avan Than Ejamaanudaiya Aasthigalai Azhiththuppodugiradhaaga Ejamaanukku Arivikkappattadhu.
2 appozhudhu Ejamaan Avanai Varavazhaiththu: Unnaikkuriththu Naan Ippadik Kelvippadugiradhenna? Un Ukkiraanak Kanakkai Yoppuvi, Ini Nee Ukkiraanakkaaranaayirukkakkoodaadhu Endraan.
3 appozhudhu Ukkiraanakkaaran: Naan Enna Seyven, En Ejamaan Ukkiraana Visaarippilirundhu Ennaith Thallippodugiraane; Koththugiradharku Enakkup Belanillai, Irakkavum Vetkappadugiren.
4 ukkiraana Visaarippaivittu Naan Thallappadumpodhu, Ennaith Thangal Veedugalil Etrukkolvaar Undaagumpadi Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Enakkuth Theriyavandhadhu, Endru Thanakkulle Sollikkondu;
5 than Ejamaanidaththil Kadanpattavargalai Ovvoruvanaaga Varavazhaiththu: Mudhalaavadhu Vandhavanai Nokki: Nee En Ejamaanidaththil Patta Kadan Evvalavu Endraan.
6 avan: Noorukudam Enney Endraan. Appozhudhu Ukkiraanakkaaran Avanai Nokki: Nee Un Seettai Vaangi, Utkaarndhu, Aimbadhu Endru Seekkiramaai Ezhudhu Endraan.
7 pinbu Avan Veroruvanai Nokki: Nee Patta Kadan Evvalavu Endraan. Avan: Nooru Kalam Godhumai Endraan. Appozhudhu Avan: Nee Un Seettaivaangi, Enbadhu Endru Ezhudhu Endraan.

8 aneedhiyulla Ukkiraanakkaaran Puththiyaaich Seydhaan Endru Ejamaan Kandu, Avanai Mechchikkondaan. Ivvidhamaai Oliyin Pillaigalaippaarkkilum Indhap Pirabanjaththin Pillaigal Thangal Sandhadhiyil Adhiga Puththimaangalaayirukkiraargal.
9 naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiren, Neengal Maalumbodhu Ungalai Niththiyamaana Veedugalile Etrukkolvaarundaagumpadi, Aneedhiyaana Ulagapporulaal Ungalukkuch Sinegidharaich Sambaadhiyungal.
10 konjaththile Unmaiyullavan Anegaththilum Unmaiyullavanaayirukkiraan, Konjaththile Aneedhiyullavan Anegaththilum Aneedhiyullavanaayirukkiraan.
11 aneedhiyaana Ulagapporulaippatri Neengal Unmaiyaayiraavittaal, Yaar Ungalai Nambi Ungalidaththil Meyyaana Porulai Oppuvippaargal?
12 veroruvanudaiya Kaariyaththil Neengal Unmaiyullavargalaayiraavittaal, Ungalukku Yaadhondraich Sondhamaagak Koduppavar Yaar?

13 endha Oozhiyakkaaranum Irandu Ejamaangalukku Oozhiyanjeyyakkoodaathu, Oruvanaip Pagaiththu Matravanaich Sinegippaan, Alladhu Oruvanaip Patrikkondu Matravanai, Asattaipannuvaan. Dhevanukkum Ulagapporulukkum Oozhiyanjeyya Ungalaale Koodaadhu Endraar.
14 ivaigalaiyellaam Porulaasaikkaararaagiya Pariseyarum Kettu, Avaraip Pariyaasampanninaargal.

15 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Manusharmunbaaga Ungalai Needhimaangalaagak Kaattugireergal, Dhevano Ungal Irudhayangalai Arindhirukkiraar; Manusharukkulle Menmaiyaaga Ennappadugiradhu Dhevanukku Munbaaga Aruvaruppaayirukkiradhu.

16 niyaayappiramaanamum Theerkadharisana Vaakkiyangalum Yovaanvaraikkum Vazhangivandhadhu; Adhumudhal Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Suviseshamaai Arivikkappattuvarugiradhu, Yaavarum Balavandhamaai Adhil Piravesikkiraargal.
17 vedhaththil Oru Ezhuththin Uruppu Avamaaip Povadhaippaarkkilum, Vaanamum Boomiyum Ozhindhupovadhu Elidhaayirukkum.
18 than Manaiviyaith Thallivittu, Veroruththiyai Vivaagampannugiravan Vibachaaranjeygiraan, Purushanaale Thallappattavalai Vivaagampannugiravanum Vibachaaranjeygiraan.
19 aisuvariyamulla Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avan Raththaambaramum Vilaiyerappetra Vasthiramum Thariththu, Anudhinamum Sambiramamaai Vaazhndhukondirundhaan.
20 laasaru Ennum Perkonda Oru Thariththiranum Irundhaan; Avan Parukkal Niraindhavanaai, Andha Aisuvariyavaanudaiya Vaasalaruge Kidandhu,
21 avanudaiya Mejaiyilirundhu Vizhun Thunikkaigalaale Than Pasiyai Aatra Aasaiyaayirundhaan; Naaigal Vandhu Avan Parukkalai Nakkitru.
22 pinbu Andhath Thariththiran Mariththu, Dhevadhoodharaal Aabiragaamudaiya Madiyile Kondupoi Vidappattaan; Aisuvariyavaanum Mariththu Adakkam Pannappattaan.
23 paadhaalaththile Avan Vedhanaippadugirapodhu, Than Kangalai Ereduththu, Dhooraththile Aabiragaamaiyum Avan Madiyile Laasaruvaiyum Kandaan.

24 appozhudhu Avan: Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaame, Neer Enakku Irangi, Laasaru Than Viralin Nuniyaith Thanneeril Thoiththu, En Naavaik Kulirappannumbadi Avanai Anuppavendum; Indha Akkinijuvaalaiyil Vedhanaippadugirene Endru Kooppittaan.

25 adharku Aabiragaam: Magane, Nee Boomiyile Uyirodirukkung Kaalaththil Un Nanmaigalai Anubaviththaai, Laasaruvum Appadiye Theemaigalai Anubaviththaan, Adhai Ninaiththukkol; Ippozhudhu Avan Thetrappadugiraan, Neeyo Vedhanaippadugiraai.

26 adhuvumallaamal, Ivvidaththilirundhu Ungalidaththirkuk Kadandhupogavum, Avvidaththilirundhu Engalidaththirkuk Kadandhuvaravum Manadhullavargalukkuk Koodaadhapadikku, Engalukkum Ungalukkum Naduve Perumpilappu Undaakkappattirukkiradhu Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Avan: Appadiyaanaal, Thagappane, Enakku Aindhu Per Sagodhararundu, Avargalum Vedhanaiyulla Indha Idaththukku Varaadhapadi, Avan Poi Avargalukkuch Saatchiyaaga Arivikkum Poruttu,
28 neer Avanai En Thagappan Veettukku Anuppumpadi Ummai Vendikkollugiren Endraan.
29 aabiragaam Avanai Nokki: Avargalukku Moseyum Theerkkadharisigalum Undu, Avargalukku Avargal Sevikodukkattum Endraan.
30 adharku Avan: Appadiyalla, Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaame, Mariththorilirundhu Oruvan Avargalidaththirkup Ponaal Mananthirumbuvaargal Endraan.
31 adharku Avan: Avargal Mosekkum Theerkkadharisigalukkum Sevikodaavittaal, Mariththorilirundhu Oruvan Ezhundhuponaalum, Nambamaattaargalendru Sonnaan Endraar.
